EmoteActions.Message: No, this is for you.  I have no need of the Writ.  Use it to acquire your new home!  Even if you have purchased the house, some dwellings further require them for maintenance payments.

What an interesting ... umm ... mechanism! I have no idea what it's for! But you know, those Arcanum Researchers, they've been working with odd metals like this -- you should ask one of them. You can find them in the libraries in Cragstone, Hebian-To, or Zaikhal.

I see that you have visited revenge upon the man that wanted to bring our race to an end. Nuhmudira thanks you for this. Here is your reward.
GaerlanSwordTurnin
If you hand the token back to me I will make sure that you are recognized for your efforts. The madness of his reign is over and now we can move forward.
We need all the ingots we can get.  One day, you will be grateful we have such a stockpile.
We need all the ingots we can get.  One day, you will be grateful we have such a stockpile.

A rare find!  My congratulations.  Here is your Writ of Refuge.  The Empyrean have left many secrets for us to puzzle out.  Their geomancy recently became transparent to us.  This powder might reveal yet another crucial part of their power.  We shall crush the enemy through their own devices!
Thank you for bringing us this Niffis Pearl. It is thought it may be useful. Take this Writ as your reward.
Well! Would you look at this! This should be useful!
We thought this jelly was useless for a time. But we've recently discovered it has certain properties which are of much interest to us. Please, take this Writ as a reward.
We feared we would never be able to lay our hands on this poison again. Thank you for choosing to part with such a rare item!
NuhmudiraTokenQuestComplete
PrismFragmentAcidGiven
PrismFragmentFireGiven
PrismFragmentLightningGiven
PrismFragmentIceGiven
GaerlanSwordTurnin
From this day forward %s shall be known as Gaerlan Slayer.
This is a strange device indeed. I have never seen anything like this before. Hmm...
The Agent ponders this strange new item momentarily.
I'll tell you what. I'll take this thing off your hands and give you a Writ of Refuge in exchange! Sounds like a good enough deal, eh? Then it is settled!

I've seen a number of pearls in my days... You know we exchange Niffis Pearls for writs correct? ... Anyway, I have seen a number of pearls before, but this is obviously not from any niffis I've seen.

Look at how dark this pearl is, it seems to eat the very light around it. This is a truly rare find, some ancient Empyrean decoration no doubt, but I can't imagine it would be very different from the niffis pearls we know of.
I'll give you a special deal on this pearl, since it is obviously of a different quality than your common niffis pearls.
Oh, the token, I guess you deserve this.
Ah yes, I seem to recall that our leather crafters stopped making shirts out of these. Don't worry, we have plenty in stock. Here, let me get you a shirt this hide.
Forge Essence! We can surely use as much of this as you can lay your hands on.
Forge Essence! We can surely use as much of this as you can lay your hands on.
Forge Essence! We can surely use as much of this as you can lay your hands on.
Thank you. If you need to see the list of tradable items again, just ask.
There are few beasts on Dereth as feared and hated as the Margul Sezzherei. To meet one who has personally slain the creature... I cannot believe it!
You should be commended for your efforts. From this point forward, let it be known to all that you are the Sezzherei Slayer!
I see that you have visited revenge upon the man that wanted to bring our race to an end. Nuhmudira thanks you for this. Here is your reward.
GaerlanSwordTurnin
If you hand the token back to me I will make sure that you are recognized for your efforts. The madness of his reign is over and now we can move forward.

SacrificedNuhmudiraAgent
%n shakes their head at you condemningly.
You are still a cur unworthy of trust. I am only too grateful to the wisdom and compassion of others. With their help, and theirs alone was Nuhmudira freed.

You are fortunate that she has pity within her heart enough to grant you the trappings that you need to obtain housing. If you give me any of these items listed here, then I will grudgingly give you a Writ of Refuge.
SacrificedNuhmudira
SacrificedNuhmudiraAgent
SacrificedNuhmudira
%n smiles at you gently.
You have done much to help us. Your sacrifice and actions assisted Nuhmudira in her darkest hour and we thank you for those efforts.
If you have not yet done so, seek out Balthazar outside of Lin. He will instruct you on how you may further aid us.

Housing continues to be provided through a joint effort of the Arcanum and the High Queen. Writs are required for these domiciles. Once you possess a Writ of Refuge, seek out a Covenant Stone and determine what else is needed to purchase your homestead. Also of note are new dwellings that have been opened that offer a more communal living arrangement.
Here is a list items we will accept in exchange for writs.
%n salutes you.

Thank you for investigating this matter for the Arcanum!  No, we do not yet comprehend the extent of the schemes of this minion.  I have confidence we shall find out soon, though.  Here is your Writ.  As of this time, we do not need any further tokens from you.  We will however still take the other trophies I mentioned to you.
Wow! Great work. Here is your reward. You are looking a little green my friend. Are you feeling okay?
We only wanted to see that you had achieved what we asked. Seeing as how you did so well you should keep this.
You never know, you may find a use for it yet.
Wow! Great work. Here is your reward. Umm, I think your britches may be burning.
We only wanted to see that you had achieved what we asked. Seeing as how you did so well you should keep this.
You never know, you may find a use for it yet.
Wow! Great work. Here is your reward. You know your hair looks as though it is standing on end.
We only wanted to see that you had achieved what we asked. Seeing as how you did so well you should keep this.
You never know, you may find a use for it yet.
Wow! Great work. Here is your reward. Was it cold in there?
We only wanted to see that you had achieved what we asked. Seeing as how you did so well you should keep this.
You never know, you may find a use for it yet.
I have recently rewarded you for visiting revenge up on that madman. Please come back to me in one day before asking for another reward.
SacrificedNuhmudiraAgent
SacrificedNuhmudira
The Agent bows their head low and speaks softly.

Although Nuhmudira has returned to us, we have learned that there is still a way to show your support for her. Outside of Stonehold there is a portal to the dungeon where she was once imprisoned. There you can choose to sacrifice yourself for her or to abandon her to her fate. It is odd that the magic has yet to dissipate.

If you require writs we will accept any of the items on this list in exchange for a writ. Once you possess a Writ of Refuge, and have satisfied the other requirements for purchasing a home, seek out one of the homestead areas that we have built. If you would rather, you can enjoy living in one of the new dwelling areas that have been established for a more communal living arrangement.
I already informed you that we no longer need any tokens from you.  We will however still take the other trophies I mentioned to you.
Wow! You were able to navigate that place again. Great Job! We are not giving repeat offenders the Writs, but everything else is still available.
Wow! You were able to navigate that place again. Great Job! We are not giving repeat offenders the Writs, but everything else is still available.
